data.name: Zombie Army 4: MP.1940 SMG Bundle
data.detailed_description:
Spray the dead away with a new SMG, charms and skins!

Fast, effective and hot as hell, the MP.1940 gained a reputation for being too hot to handle – literally! This intense machine pistol has a high rate of fire, and bewildering precision at short distances. So it’s time to gear up and get out there!
This Weapon Bundle contains;
- The MP.1940 SMG
- 2 Charms (Irminsul Stick Pin, ZAT Eagle)
- 2 Bespoke Weapon Skins (Ahnenerbe, Messerschmitt ME-109)

data.short_description: Spray the dead away with a new SMG, charms and skins!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit / Windows 7 64-bit*
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 (or AMD equivalent)
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030 2GB (or AMD equivalent)
  • Additional Notes: *Windows 7 64-bit version 7601 supported only via the Vulkan launcher option.
